sentences.sentence: Most of us have this ability to reduce ourself.
sentences.translation: 我们中的大部分人都有这种能力：降低自我期望。

sentences.sentence: But, the truth is, there will always be some people more successful than ourself.
sentences.translation: 但是真相是，总有一些人比我们更成功。

sentences.sentence: It is important to know our good and bad points because this knowledge will help us to improve ourself.
sentences.translation: 对于我们来说，正确地认识自身的优缺点是很重要的，因为这个认识有助于我们自身的提高。
